feed.title: Bitcoin intro and talks in Berlin (11th May at 20:00)

entry.title: Bitcoin intro and talks in Berlin (11th May at 20:00)
entry.summary: C-Base, a Berlin-based hacker and maker space, is organizing an event on peer-to-peer (p2p) technologies on the 11th of an unspecified month. The event will include a section on Bitcoin starting at 20:00. Those who are interested in giving a talk at the event can email Genjix at genjix@riseup.net to be added to the schedule.
